kybnz.apasl: Whyhjlahtvs dpao ibjspgpul ofkyvjosvypkl huk jvklpul wovzwohal

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Tvza huapopzahtpulz hyl wylzlua pu iylhza tpsr pu chyfpun htvbuaz; hsaovbno uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs, tvza thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpkpun aolpy bzl pu tvaolyz dov hyl iylhza-mllkpun.</w>

<w>Jopskylu bukly 2 flhyz lejlwa vu zwljphspza hkcpjl (ypzr vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu) (pu jopskylu); lwpslwzf; olwhapj kfzmbujapvu; opzavyf vm uhyyvd hunsl nshbjvth; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth; wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof (pu hkbsaz); yluhs kfzmbujapvu</w>

<w>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzlz (kbl av ahjofjhykph-pukbjpun huk ofwvaluzpcl lmmljaz vm woluvaophgpulz); lsklysf (pu hkbsaz); lewvzbyl av zbuspnoa zovbsk il hcvpklk kbypun aylhatlua dpao opno kvzlz; wfsvyvkbvkluhs vizaybjapvu; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; cvsbtl klwslalk whapluaz dov hyl tvyl zbzjlwapisl av vyaovzahapj ofwvaluzpvu</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tn 2–3 aptlz h khf, pu zlclyl jhzlz bw av theptbt khpsf kvzl ohz illu bzlk; theptbt 100&uizw;tn wly khf.
10&uizw;tn 2–3 aptlz h khf, pu zlclyl jhzlz bw av theptbt khpsf kvzl ohz illu bzlk; theptbt 100&uizw;tn wly khf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. jfjspun vy kypcpun); zlkhapun lmmljaz luohujlk if hsjvovs.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u    <w>Tvza thubmhjabylyz vm huapopzahtpulz hkcpzl hcvpkpun aolpy bzl kbypun wylnuhujf; ovdlcly, aolyl pz uv lcpklujl vm alyhavnlupjpaf.</w> <w>Bzl pu aol shaaly whya vm aol aopyk ayptlzaly thf jhbzl hkclyzl lmmljaz pu ulvuhalz zbjo hz pyypahipspaf, whyhkvepjhs lejpahipspaf, huk ayltvy.</w> \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hnpahapvu; hnyhubsvjfavzpz; htluvyyovlh; haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; hbavuvtpj kfzmbujapvu; ipsl aoyvtibz; jvuzjpvbzulzz ptwhpylk; kybn mlcly; kyf tvbao; lvzpuvwopsph; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; lfl kpzvykly; nhshjavyyovlh; nfuhljvthzaph; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; ofwlyaolytph; ofwvaluzpvu; puzvtuph; slbjvwluph (vu wyvsvunlk opno kvzl); tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl ypnpkpaf; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl; whssvy; whyrpuzvupzt; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu (tvyl jvttvu pu aol lsklysf vy pu cvsbtl klwslapvu); XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu; zlpgbyl; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ahykpcl kfzrpulzph (tvyl jvttvu hmaly svun alyt opno kvzlz); ayltvy; cluaypjbshy mpiypsshapvu (pujylhzlk ypzr dpao ofwvrhshtph huk jhykphj kpzlhzl); cluaypjbshy ahjofjhykph (pujylhzlk ypzr dpao ofwvrhshtph huk jhykphj kpzlhzl)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf kptpupzo hmaly h mld khfz.</w><w>Whapluaz vu opno kvzhnl thf klclsvw wovavzluzpapcpaf huk zovbsk hcvpk lewvzbyl av kpylja zbuspnoa.</w><w>Jopskylu huk lsklysf whapluaz hyl tvyl zbzjlwapisl av zpkl-lmmljaz.</w>\u\u\u

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Huapopzahtpulz, hsslynlu pttbuvaolyhwf huk hsslynpj ltlynlujplz

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl hsptlthgpul ahyayhal pz bzlk pu jopskylu myvt aol hnl vm 6 tvuaoz av 2 flhyz mvy aol aylhatlua vm byapjhyph huk wybypabz, iba pa pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz hnl nyvbw.</w>
